lore: After Zonte became a God, he returned to the tower to prevent its collapse. After dispelling the magic overload, he found this creature next to the Celestial Occultist at point 0. Its magic powers were extraordinary, although insignificant next to Zonte's. After getting rid of the Failed Experiment and expelling the Occultists, he found that it reappeared under certain circumstances. The residual energy from Ainsworth's experiment had permanently linked the creature to the tower's structure.
menagerieDialog: (It has an extremely punchable expression on its face.)
(This creature has such a goofy face that even your normally-stoic personality is no match for the temptation to knock it flat on its slimy ass.)
(For some reason, you find its undeterrable happiness to be quite obnoxious.)
(It's nibbiling at random bits of dust and debris off the floor. You should really find it some decent food to eat.)
name: Failed Experiment
